entry.title: LeetCode
entry.content: 1. Two Sum c solution12345678910111213141516171819202122232425/** * Note: The returned array must be malloced, assume caller calls free(). */int* twoSum(int* nums, int numsSize, int target) { int targetNum[numsSize]; int* newArray=NULL; int j=0; for(int i=0;i<numsSize;i++) { targetNum[i]=target-nums[i]; } for(int i=0;i<numsSize;i++) for(j=i+1;j<numsSize;j++) { if(targetNum[i]==nums[j]) { newArray=(int*)malloc(sizeof(int)*2); newArray[0]=i; newArray[1]=j; break; } } return newArray; }
